dcterms:description: SimChart9K is a synthetic chart dataset composed of 9,098 charts and associated data annotations in CSV format, generated to enhance chart perception performance.
dcterms:title: SimChart9K

dcterms:description: ChartQA is a large-scale visual reasoning dataset with 20,882 charts collected from online sources, designed for question answering about charts.
dcterms:title: ChartQA

dcterms:description: PlotQA is a synthetic dataset that covers 28.9 million question-answer pairs spread across 224,377 plots, aimed at reasoning over scientific plots.
dcterms:title: PlotQA

dcterms:creator: Samira Ebrahimi Kahou

dcterms:description: FigureQA is a visual reasoning corpus consisting of over one million human-designed question-answer pairs, designed for reasoning tasks involving figures.
dcterms:title: FigureQA

dcterms:creator: Jason Obeid
Enamul Hoque
dcterms:description: Chart2Text is a dataset for automatic summarization of statistical charts, yielding a total of 8,305 charts with annotations.
dcterms:title: Chart2Text
